10001.name: Glitter
10001.effect: Attack the opponent while infused with light.

10002.name: Daybreak Strike
10002.effect: A strong light-based attack that deals double damage if it's sunny.

10003.name: Shimmer Strike
10003.effect: A quick, light-infused strike. This move has a +1 priority.

10004.name: Photon Blade
10004.effect: Create a blade of pure light that slices through the opponent's defense. This move will ignore the target's Defense stat.

10005.name: Lustrous Cut
10005.effect: Intensify the light at a single line to cut through the opponent.

10006.name: Stellar Blade
10006.effect: Emits a powerful burst of cosmic light from a distant celestial source, then strike at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack.

10007.name: Light Convergence
10007.effect: Concentrate light into a single point, dealing massive damage but harshly lowering the user's Defense stat.

10008.name: Shine
10008.effect: Damage the opponent with bright light.

10009.name: Bright Beam
10009.effect: Emit a concentraded beam of light at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of confusing the target.

10010.name: Energy Surge
10010.effect: Radiate a huge wave of energy that damages all foes on the opposing field, while increasing self and allies' Special Attack stat.

10011.name: Dazzling Gleam
10011.effect: Send out a burst of dazzling light at all opposing foes, with a 10% chance of causing target(s) to flinch.

10012.name: Prismatic Wave
10012.effect: Send out a wave of shifting light that has a 20% chance of confusing the target.

10013.name: Radiant Burst
10013.effect: Release a powerful burst of light that deals damage to the opponent, but will be unable to use Light-typed move on next turn.

10014.name: Starfall
10014.effect: Bring the bursting light of a nearby star to crush down, striking everyone around the user, foes and allies.

10015.name: Solar Flare
10015.effect: Unleash a concentraed flare of sunlight at the opponent, with a 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

10016.name: Celestial Beam
10016.effect: A high-energy beam from the sky that deals damage to the opponent and has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense.

10017.name: Flash
10017.effect: The user flashes a bright light that harshly lowers the target's accuracy.

10018.name: Flashbang
10018.effect: Blind the opponent with a sudden flash, causing confusion.

10019.name: Aurora Veil
10019.effect: Create a protective veil that reduces the damage from physical and special moves for 5 turns.

10020.name: Safe Haven
10020.effect: Create a protective sanctuary that prevents status condition for 5 turns.

10021.name: Radiant Glow
10021.effect: Heal 50% of the user's HP with a soothing light.

10022.name: Sunlit Grace
10022.effect: Heal all on-field allies' HP by 50% with the power of sunlight.

10023.name: Moonlit Blessing
10023.effect: Heal all on-field allies' status conditions with the gentle light of the moon.
